title: Unrefined Shea Butter Ivory| Bulk Shea Butter
description:
Discover the Ultimate in Nourishing and Empowering Shea Butter with 3CayG

At 3CayG, we believe in the transformative power of natural and sustainably sourced products, which is why we are proud to offer the finest raw unrefined shea butter on the market. Lab tested and imported using optimal transport conditions, our shea butter is extracted directly from the nuts of the African shea tree (Vitellaria paradoxa) and is exclusively produced in Benin by our local women's cooperative. With a rich, nutty aroma at its freshest peak, this ivory-colored butter can vary in shade from ivory to pale yellow.

Unleash the Benefits of Shea Butter for Your Skin and Hair

Whether used alone or as an ingredient in whipped body butters, hair care products, and skincare, our raw unrefined shea butter offers an array of benefits for your skin and hair. Shea butter is a natural source of vitamins A and E, which are essential for skin health, and it is also rich in moisturizing properties, making it a perfect choice for those with dry or sensitive skin. Additionally, shea butter has been shown to improve the look and feel of hair, helping to nourish and hydrate strands for a smooth, silky finish.

Join the Movement to Empower Women and Improve Communities

At 3CayG, we believe in the power of community and the impact that our choices can have on the world. That's why we have partnered with an admirable and resilient community of women in Benin to bring you the finest shea butter products. By purchasing our shea butter, you are not only nourishing your skin and hair but also contributing to building a better world, one butter at a time. Follow the journey on Instagram or Facebook @3CAYG and @3CayGBenin to see how your butter is made and help contribute to the solution.

Bulk Orders and Refined Options Available

Looking for a larger supply of shea butter for your business or cosmetic line? Look no further than 3CayG. With bulk options available in quantities up to 40,000lb+ container, you can rest assured that you are getting the highest quality shea butter on the market. And for those looking for a refined option, we also offer yellow and white refined shea butter. Contact us at info@3CayG.com for a quote today.

Transform Your Beauty Routine and Empower Women - Order 3CayG Shea Butter Now!
